=== I installed the downloaded archive using the Extension Manager, but the Writer's Tools doesn't appear anywhere. Am I doing something wrong? ===

Yes. You have to unpack the downloaded archive first, and then install it using the Extension Manager

=== Where do I get help with Writer's Tools? ===

If you have questions, problems, or ideas how to improve Writer's Tools, post them in the [http://code.google.com/p/writertools/issues/list Issues] section.

=== Is there a manual of sorts? ===

Yes, a comprehensive Writer's Tools manual is available in both printed and PDF formats at the [http://www.lulu.com/content/2115121 Lulu bookstore]. The manual covers all the important topics, which can help you to get the most out of the Writer's Tools OpenOffice.org extension. It's easier to read, too.

=== How do I contact the author? ===

To avoid spam, the bast way to contact the author is via Jabber (dmpop@jabber.org). You can also stalk the author via Twitter (http://twitter.com/dmpop).
